item.name: Pre-requisite - Assign Role to Default Team

request.description: Get Default Team that is present in the Org
Get user1 to assign to Account records
Get user2 to assign to Account records
Get user3 to assign to Account records
Get FallAbck User
Get user2 to assign to Account records

body.raw:
{
   "cmc_fetchxml":"<fetch version=\"1.0\" output-format=\"xml-platform\" mapping=\"logical\" distinct=\"false\">\n  <entity name=\"lead\">\n    <attribute name=\"fullname\" />\n    <attribute name=\"companyname\" />\n    <attribute name=\"telephone1\" />\n    <attribute name=\"leadid\" />\n    <order attribute=\"fullname\" descending=\"false\" />\n    <filter type=\"and\">\n      <condition attribute=\"fullname\" operator=\"like\" value=\"DOMInbound{{globalsessionvalue}}%\" />\n    </filter>\n  </entity>\n</fetch>",
   
   "cmc_baseentity":"lead",
   "cmc_FallBackUserId@odata.bind":"/systemusers({{gFallbackuser}})",
   "cmc_assigntofield":"ownerid",
   "cmc_assigntofieldname": "Owner",
   "cmc_name":"AG-inbound{{$randomInt}}",
   "statecode": 0,
   "statuscode": 1,
   "cmc_baseentityname": "Inbound Interest",
   "ownerid@odata.bind":"/systemusers({{ownerid}})"
}

request.description: pull all the Inbound Interest records who have their name begining with a certain character (e.g DOMInbound%)

body.raw:
{
   "cmc_fetchxml":"<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="true">
  <entity name="lead">
    <attribute name="fullname" />
    <attribute name="companyname" />
    <attribute name="telephone1" />
    <attribute name="leadid" />
    <order attribute="fullname" descending="false" />
    <link-entity name="account" from="accountid" to="cmc_sourcecampusid" link-type="inner" alias="ae">
      <link-entity name="customeraddress" from="parentid" to="accountid" link-type="inner" alias="af">
        <filter type="and">
          <condition attribute="mshied_mailtype" operator="eq" value="494280000" />
          <condition attribute="cmc_country" operator="eq" value="175490231" />
          <condition attribute="cmc_stateprovince" operator="eq" value="175490332" />
        </filter>
      </link-entity>
    </link-entity>
  </entity>
</fetch>",

   "cmc_executionorder":1,
   "cmc_assignmenttype":175490000,
   "cmc_name":"AR1-Inbound-{{$randomInt}}",
   "ownerid@odata.bind":"/systemusers({{ownerid}})",
   "cmc_baseentity":"lead",
   "cmc_UsertoAssignId@odata.bind": "/systemusers({{gAssigntoUser1}})",  
   "cmc_AssignmentGroupId@odata.bind":"/cmc_assignmentgroups({{gassignmentgroupid}})"
}

request.description: Assign Inbound Interest to User A when Source campus's Address is having 'Mail type= 'Primary' and Country and state are 'US and Texas'

body.raw:
{
   "cmc_fetchxml":"<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="lead">
    <attribute name="fullname" />
    <attribute name="companyname" />
    <attribute name="telephone1" />
    <attribute name="leadid" />
    <order attribute="fullname" descending="false" />
    <link-entity name="contact" from="contactid" to="customerid" link-type="inner" alias="ah">
      <filter type="and">
        <condition attribute="cmc_recentsat" operator="le" value="500" />
      </filter>
    </link-entity>
  </entity>
</fetch>",
   "cmc_executionorder":2,
   "cmc_assignmenttype":175490000,
   "cmc_name":"AR2-Inbound-{{$randomInt}}",
   "ownerid@odata.bind":"/systemusers({{ownerid}})",
   "cmc_baseentity":"lead",
   "cmc_UsertoAssignId@odata.bind": "/systemusers({{gAssignDOMtoUser2}})",
   "cmc_AssignmentGroupId@odata.bind":"/cmc_assignmentgroups({{gassignmentgroupid}})"
}

request.description: Assign Inbound Interest to User B when parent Contact 's Test score for 'Recent SAT' should be less than or equal to 500

body.raw:
{
   "cmc_fetchxml":"<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="lead">
    <attribute name="fullname" />
    <attribute name="cmc_sourcesubcategoryid" />
    <attribute name="cmc_sourcereferringstaffid" />
    <attribute name="cmc_sourcereferringorganizationid" />
    <attribute name="cmc_sourcereferringcontactid" />
    <attribute name="cmc_sourcemethodid" />
    <attribute name="cmc_sourcedate" />
    <attribute name="cmc_sourcecategoryid" />
    <attribute name="cmc_sourcecampusid" />
    <attribute name="cmc_sourcecampaignid" />
    <attribute name="companyname" />
    <attribute name="ownerid" />
    <attribute name="cmc_sourceprgmlevelid" />
    <attribute name="cmc_sourceprgmid" />
    <attribute name="cmc_expectedstartid" />
    <attribute name="leadid" />
    <order attribute="fullname" descending="true" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="cmc_sourcecategoryid" operator="eq" uiname="Internet" uitype="cmc_sourcecategory" value="{A68C19F7-142B-E811-A965-000D3A11E605}" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>",
   "cmc_executionorder":3,
   "cmc_assignmenttype":175490001,
   "cmc_name":"AR3-Inbound-{{$randomInt}}",
   "ownerid@odata.bind":"/systemusers({{ownerid}})",
   "cmc_baseentity":"lead",
   "cmc_TeamtoAssignId@odata.bind": "/teams({{gteamId}})",   
   "cmc_AssignmentGroupId@odata.bind":"/cmc_assignmentgroups({{gassignmentgroupid}})"
}

request.description: Assign Inbound Interest to Team when 'Source Category' is 'Internet'

body.raw:
{
   "cmc_fetchxml":"<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="lead">
    <attribute name="fullname" />
    <attribute name="companyname" />
    <attribute name="telephone1" />
    <attribute name="leadid" />
    <attribute name="ownerid" />
    <attribute name="cmc_domstatus" />
    <order attribute="fullname" descending="false" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="cmc_sourceprgmid" operator="not-null" />
      <condition attribute="cmc_sourceprgmlevelid" operator="not-null" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>",
   "cmc_executionorder":4,
   "cmc_assignmenttype":175490000,
   "cmc_name":"AR4-Inbound-{{$randomInt}}",
   "ownerid@odata.bind":"/systemusers({{ownerid}})",
   "cmc_baseentity":"lead",
   "cmc_UsertoAssignId@odata.bind": "/systemusers({{gAssignDOMtoUser3}})",  
   "cmc_AssignmentGroupId@odata.bind":"/cmc_assignmentgroups({{gassignmentgroupid}})"
}

request.description: Assign Inbound Interest to 'Fall back User' having both 'program' and 'program level' data

body.raw:
{
   "cmc_fetchxml":"<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="lead">
    <attribute name="fullname" />
    <attribute name="cmc_sourcesubcategoryid" />
    <attribute name="cmc_sourcereferringstaffid" />
    <attribute name="cmc_sourcereferringorganizationid" />
    <attribute name="cmc_sourcereferringcontactid" />
    <attribute name="cmc_sourcemethodid" />
    <attribute name="cmc_sourcedate" />
    <attribute name="cmc_sourcecategoryid" />
    <attribute name="cmc_sourcecampusid" />
    <attribute name="cmc_sourcecampaignid" />
    <attribute name="companyname" />
    <attribute name="ownerid" />
    <attribute name="cmc_sourceprgmlevelid" />
    <attribute name="cmc_sourceprgmid" />
    <attribute name="cmc_expectedstartid" />
    <attribute name="leadid" />
    <order attribute="fullname" descending="true" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="createdon" operator="this-week" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>",
   "cmc_executionorder":5,
   "cmc_assignmenttype":175490000,
   "cmc_name":"AR5-Inbound-ExistingQuery-{{$randomInt}}",
   "ownerid@odata.bind":"/systemusers({{ownerid}})",
   "cmc_baseentity":"lead",
   "cmc_UsertoAssignId@odata.bind": "/systemusers({{gAssignDOMtoUser3}})",  
   "cmc_AssignmentGroupId@odata.bind":"/cmc_assignmentgroups({{gassignmentgroupid}})"
}
